Articles.Content:
Hello everybody, 

I have been playing KSP for nearly two years and reading these forums for a few months. I didn't took time to register so far because ... there are so many great posts to read here I never found anything to add but since lot of things will change very soon in the game, I thought it could be the time to do it.

Fly safe !

P.S. : Sorry, my english is not the best.

Eh, was about time to join this community ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif). Welcome aboard!

Be sure, your opinion matters, and as with many other forumists every day, your contributions to discussions here (while kept civil, within rules) will be appreciated. 

And, your english is good enough (and sure will further improve staying with us ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)).
Welcome to the forums! I doubt people will mind you english.
Welcome to the forums! (and your English is fine) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Welcome, you're just right in time to enjoy v1.0! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
also forum games. all the forum games.
Welcome, welcome! Just in time for 1.0 and my #shamelessplug! (Link in the sig)
Welcome! I lurked for a while too, before I joined. Don't be a stranger!
